subject: Public Speaking
title: Finding Your Orator Voice
description: A fast breakdown of Finding Your Orator Voice for builders.

hook.text: You don't need to be famous to be an orator. Find your voice.

buildup.text: Your voice combines your perspective, experience, and passion.

discovery.text: Know what you believe deeply and why it matters.

twist.text: Once you know your message, style develops from authenticity.

climax.text: The world needs YOU expressing what only you can see.

punchline.text: Speak your truth. The world needs YOUR voice.

quiz.question: How do you find your voice?
options: Know beliefs, why they matter, express authentically
